name: Pop-Up Ad Closing Simulator
description:
My submission to the 1-Button Jam 2022. I had an idea for a second game for this Jam, but I'm too busy to make it.

Close all of the ads as fast as possible, without closing the original window. Basically just a "how fast can you press this button 14 times" game.

CONTROL:
  • BACKSPACE - Close the top-level window
CREDITS:
  • Programming - D Lawson (Donian/Me)
  • Game Idea - E Wallace
  • Paint Ad Artwork - D Lawson, E Wallace, M Whittaker
  • Other Artwork - Can be found (with origin) in my other games
